summary: An email from an unidentified sender to a team regarding an upcoming grand jury presentation on March 29, 2021. The email attaches a script outline and PowerPoint presentation for review and invites team members to join the presentation.

events.title: Grand Jury Presentation
events.description: A scheduled grand jury presentation for which a script and PowerPoint were prepared.

keyFacts: A grand jury presentation was scheduled for March 29, 2021.
The email sender prepared a script outline and PowerPoint presentation for the grand jury.
The email invites team members to provide feedback on the materials and to attend the presentation.
